oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate two-dollar bill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the pre-war and early days of the Civil War notes were often specific to certain banks and states. This two-dollar note was issued by the Bank of Chattanooga and dated January 4, 1863 while the city was still under Confederate control. The note may have belonged to Jessie A. Shaver, Co. D, 19th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA or John Adams Shaver, Co. D, 19th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA.
